name: Beat, Swordsman of the Skyfang Brigade
desc: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Skyfang Brigade" monster from your hand, except "Beat, Swordsman of the Skyfang Brigade". If another "Skyfang Brigade" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this monster is on the field: You can add 1 "Skyfang Brigade" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Beat, Swordsman of the Skyfang Brigade". You can only use each effect of "Beat, Swordsman of the Skyfang Brigade" once per turn.
